text: Uss kay siwa tum jin ko pooja paat ker rahey ho woh sab naam hi naam hain jo tum ney aur tumharay baap dadon ney khud hi gharr liye hain. Allah Taalaa ney inn ki koi daleel nazil nahi farmaee farman-rawaee sirf Allah Taalaa hi ki hai uss ka famaan hai kay rum sab siwaye uss kay kissi aur ki ibadat na kero yehi deen durust hai lekin aksar log nahi jantay
